oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Spotless apples under roof
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bertelsen, Marianne
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop husbandry
Fruit and berries
Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Is it possible to grow apples without spraying and without getting scabby fruit if you put a roof over the trees? This is investigated by Aarhus Univers√≠ty, and the results are very promising.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Bertelsen, Marianne (2013) Spotless apples under roof. ICROFS news, 1 June 2013 (2), pp. 9-10.
